about_the_game:
*Caution! Localization to English has not yet been started. *

What kind of game is it?

  • Keyboard barrage roguelike!
    • A game where you physically move around the on-screen keyboard and keep casting magic spells.
    • You can attack with spells, increase your stats, and summon animals.
  • A tense barrage!
    • Enemies will interrupt your casting with barrages of spells.
    • Cast as many spells as you can while avoiding enemy attacks.
    • Don't worry if you're not good at avoiding barrages! Increase your defense to become invincible, or summon animals to block your bullets.
  • More than 300 types of magic!
    • You can buy magic at the shop at night.
    • Choose a combination of spells that are easy to cast and create your own spell build!
    • Short spells are weak, but can be cast quickly. Long spells are powerful, but take time to cast.
  • Multiplayer support!
    • Two controllers can be connected to the same PC to allow two players to play at the same time!
    • Using Steam Remote Play Together, you can connect two controllers to each other and play multiplayer with friends who are far away from each other!

Story

This is a world where magic is commonplace.
The main character, Two Speth, is a girl who loves magic and dreams of becoming a wizard in the future.
However, even when she is old enough to use magic, she does not have any magical powers.
Two was sad. Is she destined not to become a wizard?
Two became a recluse. Poor thing.
Then, Two received a book of magic.
It was a mysterious grimoire that allows you to activate any magic by writing and chanting the spell.
With this book and you, Two's journey to collect magic has begun.
Let's make Two the strongest, best wizard!

Video submission and distribution guidelines

These are the guidelines for video submission and distribution (hereinafter referred to as "live commentary") of "Speltnael".
Please cooperate with the following points so that you can enjoy the game and not spoil the experience of other players.
  1. Permission to comment
    • You are free to comment on the game regardless of whether it is monetized or not.
    • Permission is not required. However, as described below, it would be encouraging if you could contact the developer.
  2. Prevention of spoilers
    • Please refrain from including content that may be considered as spoilers of the story in the thumbnail or title.
    • It is okay if the expression is somewhat vague.
    • Please be considerate so as not to spoil the experience of other players.
    • Spoilers about things such as magic builds, but not the story, are okay.
  3. Contact the developer (optional)
    • If possible, please send a DM to the developer's Twitter account when commenting.
    • Permission is not required, so you can comment without waiting for the developer's reply.
    • The developer may watch your commentary.
    • Twitter: @0MAD03
  4. Other requests
    • We hope you will share the fun of the game.
    • If you find any bugs or problems, please contact the developer.
    • Twitter: @0MAD03

content_descriptors.notes: There is a story progression where characters use magic, murder relatives, commit suicide, etc. This is textual, and there is no gore or anything like that.
